fields.name: AAM 1
fields.Full_description: Status, A = Arrival circle entered, V = not passed

fields.name: AAM 2
fields.Full_description: Status, A = perpendicular passed at waypoint, V = not passed

fields.name: ALM 5
fields.Full_description: SV health, bits 17-24 of each almanac page

fields.name: APA 4
fields.Full_description: Direction to steer, L or R

fields.name: APA 5
fields.Full_description: Cross Track Units (Nautic miles or kilometers)

fields.name: APA 7
fields.Full_description: Status A = Perpendicular passed at waypoint

fields.name: APB 4
fields.Full_description: Direction to steer, L or R

fields.name: APB 5
fields.Full_description: Cross Track Units, N = Nautical Miles

fields.name: APB 7
fields.Full_description: Status A = Perpendicular passed at waypoint

fields.name: APB 13
fields.Full_description: Heading to steer to destination waypoint
fields.short_description: Heading to steer to destination waypoint APB_13

sentence_description: Bearing & Distance to Waypoint - Great Circle

fields.name: BWC 13
fields.Full_description: FAA mode indicator (NMEA 2.3 and later, optional)

sentence_description: Bearing and Distance to Waypoint - Rhumb Line

fields.name: DPT 2
fields.Full_description: Offset from transducer, + = distance tansducer to water line - = transducer to keel

fields.name: DTM 2
fields.Full_description: Local datum subcode.  May be blank.

fields.name: GBS 1
fields.Full_description: UTC time of the GGA or GNS fix
fields.short_description: UTC time of the GGA GBS_1

fields.name: GBS 5
fields.Full_description: PRN of most likely failed satellite
fields.short_description: PRN of most likely failed satellite GBS_5

fields.name: GBS 6
fields.Full_description: Probability of missed detection for most likely failed satellite

fields.name: GBS 7
fields.Full_description: Estimate of bias in meters on most likely failed satellite
fields.short_description: Estimate of bias in meters GBS_7

fields.name: GBS 8
fields.short_description: Standard deviation of bias estimate GBS_8

fields.name: GGA 7
fields.short_description: Number of satellites in view GGA_7

fields.name: GGA 13
fields.Full_description: Age of differential GPS data, time in seconds since last SC104
fields.short_description: Age of differential GPS data GGA_13

fields.name: GLL 6
fields.Full_description: Status A - Data Valid, V - Data Invalid

fields.name: GRS 1
fields.Full_description: TC time of associated GGA fix
fields.short_description: TC time of associated GGA fix GRS_1

fields.name: GRS 2
fields.Full_description: 0 = Residuals used in GGA, 1 = residuals calculated after GGA

fields.name: GRS 6
fields.Full_description: Satellite 4 residual in meters (blank if unused)

fields.name: GRS 7
fields.Full_description: Satellite 5 residual in meters (blank if unused)

fields.name: GRS 8
fields.Full_description: Satellite 6 residual in meters (blank if unused)

fields.name: GRS 9
fields.Full_description: Satellite 7 residual in meters (blank if unused)

fields.name: GRS 10
fields.Full_description: Satellite 8 residual in meters (blank if unused)

fields.name: GRS 11
fields.Full_description: Satellite 9 residual in meters (blank if unused)

fields.name: GRS 12
fields.Full_description: Satellite 10 residual in meters (blank if unused)

fields.name: GRS 13
fields.Full_description: Satellite 11 residual in meters (blank if unused)

fields.name: GRS 14
fields.Full_description: Satellite 12 residual in meters (blank if unused)

fields.name: GST 1
fields.Full_description: TC time of associated GGA fix
fields.short_description: TC time of associated GGA fix GST_1

fields.name: GST 2
fields.Full_description: Total RMS standard deviation of ranges inputs to the navigation solution

fields.name: GST 3
fields.Full_description: Standard deviation (meters) of semi-major axis of error ellipse

fields.name: GST 4
fields.Full_description: Standard deviation (meters) of semi-minor axis of error ellipse

fields.name: GST 5
fields.Full_description: Orientation of semi-major axis of error ellipse (true north degrees)

fields.name: GSA 3
fields.Full_description: ID of 1st satellite used for fix
fields.short_description: ID of 1st satellite used for fix GSA_3

fields.name: GSA 4
fields.Full_description: ID of 2nd satellite used for fix
fields.short_description: ID of 2nd satellite used for fix GSA_4

fields.name: GSA 5
fields.Full_description: ID of 3rd satellite used for fix
fields.short_description: ID of 3rd satellite used for fix GSA_5

fields.name: GSA 6
fields.Full_description: ID of 4th satellite used for fix
fields.short_description: ID of 4th satellite used for fix GSA_6

fields.name: GSA 7
fields.Full_description: ID of 5th satellite used for fix
fields.short_description: ID of 5th satellite used for fix GSA_7

fields.name: GSA 8
fields.Full_description: ID of 6th satellite used for fix
fields.short_description: ID of 6th satellite used for fix GSA_8

fields.name: GSA 9
fields.Full_description: ID of 7th satellite used for fix
fields.short_description: ID of 7th satellite used for fix GSA_9

fields.name: GSA 10
fields.Full_description: ID of 8th satellite used for fix
fields.short_description: ID of 8th satellite used for fix GSA_10

fields.name: GSA 11
fields.Full_description: ID of 9th satellite used for fix
fields.short_description: ID of 9th satellite used for fix GSA_11

fields.name: GSA 12
fields.Full_description: ID of 10th satellite used for fix
fields.short_description: ID of 10th satellite used for fix GSA_12

fields.name: GSA 13
fields.Full_description: ID of 11th satellite used for fix
fields.short_description: ID of 11th satellite used for fix GSA_13

fields.name: GSA 14
fields.Full_description: ID of 12th satellite used for fix
fields.short_description: ID of 12th satellite used for fix GSA_14

fields.name: GSV 1
fields.Full_description: total number of GSV messages to be transmitted in this group
fields.short_description: total number of GSV messages GSV_1

fields.name: GSV 2
fields.Full_description: 1-origin number of this GSV message  within current group

fields.name: GSV 3
fields.Full_description: total number of satellites in view (leading zeros sent)
fields.short_description: total number of satellites in view GSV_3

fields.name: GSV 6
fields.Full_description: azimuth in degrees to true north (000-359) (leading zeros sent)
fields.short_description: azimuth in degrees to true north GSV_6

fields.name: GSV 7
fields.Full_description: SNR in dB (00-99) (leading zeros sent) more satellite info quadruples like 4-7 n) checksum

fields.name: HDG 1
fields.short_description: Magnetic Sensor heading in degrees HDG_1

fields.name: HDG 3
fields.Full_description: Magnetic Deviation direction, E = Easterly, W = Westerly

fields.name: HDG 5
fields.Full_description: Magnetic Variation direction, E = Easterly, W = Westerly

sentence_description: Trawl Headrope to Footrope and Bottom

fields.name: HFB 1
fields.short_description: Distance from headrope to footrope HFB_1

fields.name: HFB 3
fields.short_description: Distance from headrope to bottom HFB_3

fields.name: MSK 5
fields.Full_description: Frequency for MSS message status (null for no status)
fields.short_description: Frequency for MSS message status MSK_5

fields.name: RMB 3
fields.Full_description: Direction to Steer, Left or Right

fields.name: RMB 10
fields.Full_description: Range to destination in nautical miles
fields.short_description: Range to destination in nautical miles RMB_10

fields.name: RMB 11
fields.Full_description: Bearing to destination in degrees True
fields.short_description: Bearing to destination in degrees True RMB_11

fields.name: RMB 12
fields.short_description: Destination closing velocity in knots RMB_12

fields.name: RMB 13
fields.Full_description: Arrival Status, A = Arrival Circle Entered

fields.name: ROT 1
fields.Full_description: Rate Of Turn, degrees per minute, "-" means bow turns to port

fields.name: ROT 2
fields.Full_description: Status, A means data is valid

fields.name: RPM 4
fields.Full_description: Propeller pitch, % of maximum, "-" means astern

fields.name: RPM 5
fields.Full_description: Status, A means data is valid

fields.name: RSA 1
fields.Full_description: Starboard (or single) rudder sensor, "-" means Turn To Port

fields.name: RSA 2
fields.Full_description: Status, A means data is valid

fields.name: RSA 4
fields.Full_description: Status, A means data is valid

fields.name: RSD 9
fields.short_description: Cursor Range From Own Ship RSD_9

fields.name: RSD 10
fields.Full_description: Cursor Bearing Degrees Clockwise From Zero
fields.short_description: Cursor Bearing Degrees Clockwise From Zero RSD_10

fields.name: RTE 1
fields.Full_description: Total number of messages being transmitted
fields.short_description: Total number of messages being transmitted RTE_1

fields.name: TDS 1
fields.Full_description: Horizontal distance from the vessel center line
fields.short_description: Horizontal distance from the vessel center line TDS_1

fields.name: TDS 3
fields.Full_description: Horizontal distance from the transducer to the trawl along the vessel center line. The value is normally positive assuming the trawl is located behind the vessel.
fields.short_description: Horizontal distance from the transducer TDS_3

fields.name: TDS 5
fields.Full_description: Depth of the trawl below the surface
fields.short_description: Depth of the trawl below the surface TDS_5

fields.name: TPR 1
fields.short_description: Horizontal range relative to target TPR_1

fields.name: TPR 3
fields.Full_description: Bearing to target relative to vessel heading.  Resolution is one degree.
fields.short_description: Bearing to target relative to vessel heading TPR_3

fields.name: TPR 5
fields.Full_description: Depth of trawl below the surface
fields.short_description: Depth of trawl below the surface TPR_5

fields.name: TPT 1
fields.short_description: Horizontal range relative to target TPT_1

fields.name: TPT 3
fields.Full_description: True bearing to taget (ie. relative north).  Resolution is one degree.

fields.name: TPT 5
fields.Full_description: Depth of trawl below the surface
fields.short_description: Depth of trawl below the surface TPT_5

fields.name: VHW 5
fields.Full_description: Knots (speed of vessel relative to the water)

fields.name: VHW 7
fields.Full_description: Kilometers (speed of vessel relative to the water)

sentence_description: Track made good and Ground speed

fields.name: VWR 1
fields.short_description: Wind direction magnitude in degrees VWR_1

fields.name: XTE 4
fields.Full_description: Direction to steer, L or R

fields.name: XTE 5
fields.Full_description: Cross Track Units, N = Nautical Miles

fields.name: XTE 6
fields.Full_description: FAA mode indicator (NMEA 2.3 and later, optional)

fields.name: XTR 1
fields.short_description: Magnitude of cross track error XTR_1

fields.name: XTR 2
fields.Full_description: Direction to steer, L or R

sentence_description: Time & Date - UTC, day, month, year and local time zone

fields.name: ZDA 1
fields.Full_description: UTC time (hours, minutes, seconds, may have fractional subsecond)

fields.name: ZDA 6
fields.Full_description: Local zone minutes description, apply same sign as local hours
